src:
Jadwal Liga Champions 2019 Pekan Ini di SCTV
04 Nov 2019, 15:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Matchday keempat Liga Champions 2019/20 bisa dinikmati pada pertengahan pekan ini. Ada 16 pertandingan yang akan dibagi dalam dua hari dengan empat di antaranya disiarkan langsung oleh SCTV.
Di matchday keempat ini Barcelona akan dijamu Slavia Praha. Blaugrana sedang dalam kondisi menurun usai secara mengejutkan dikalahkan Levante 1-3 di La Liga.
Salah satu duel seru di pekan ini adalah Chelsea menjamu Ajax Amsterdam. Pada pertemuan di matchday ketiga, Chelsea berhasil mempermalukan Ajax di Belanda dengan skor 1-0.
Adapun Juventus akan bermain tandang pada matchday keempat Liga Champions. I Bianconeri dijamu wakil Rusia Lokomotiv Moskow.
Sementara itu klub pemegang gelar juara Liga Champions terbanyak Real Madrid akan bermain di kandang menjamu Galatasaray.
Simak jadwal lengkap siaran langsung Liga Champions matchday keempat di halaman selanjutnya:
text:
2019 Champions League Schedule of the Week on SCTV
Nov 04 2019, 15:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - 2019/20 Champions League fourth matchday can be enjoyed in the middle of this week. There are 16 matches which will be divided in two days with four of them being broadcast live on SCTV.
On this fourth matchday Barcelona will be hosted by Slavic Prague. The Blaugrana are in a state of decline after surprisingly losing to Levante 1-3 in La Liga.
One exciting duel this week is Chelsea host Ajax Amsterdam. At the third matchday meeting, Chelsea managed to embarrass Ajax in the Netherlands with a score of 1-0.
The Juventus will play away on the fourth matchday of the Champions League. I Bianconeri were hosted by Russia's Lokomotiv Moscow representative.
Meanwhile, the club that holds the most Champions League titles Real Madrid will play at home to Galatasaray.
Check out the full schedule of the fourth matchday Champions League live broadcast on the next page:
